title: Fort Point National Historic Site: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 1 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Fort Point National Historic Site Living History Day      Time: 10:00 AM to 5:00 AM Location: Fort Point National Historic Site Fees: FREE!     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Join the National Park Service, as part of the our Centennial celebration, as Fort Point comes back to life with music, marching and the colorful uniforms of the American Civil War. Talks and demonstrations are held throughout the day. View Details
